exec.name: Ashley Kikos
exec.description: Create a chapter budget for the fall and spring semester, keep a constant communication with the Student Activities and Organizations (SAO) and Business Office for Student Organizations (BOSO), monitor chapter expenses and incomes, and aid the Fundraising Chair(s) with any assistance they may need.

exec.name: Maxwell Smith
exec.description: Maintain the systems necessary to help the chapter run smoothly.
